H0.text: Photosynthesis occurs in the sunflower plant.

H1.text: Mushroom is an organism in which photosynthesis occurs.

H2.text: Sunfish are organisms in which photosynthesis occurs.

H3.text: Luna moth is an organism in which photosynthesis occurs.

A4.text: Photosynthesis occurs in plants and algae.

A5.text: Photosynthesis is performed by autotrophic organisms.
